TopicTitle: PS3 Controller Not Working in Game, but Settings Menu recognizes gamepad

Articles.Content:
So I have a PS3 controller which I use with other Steam games with not problem.  

When I go to Settings in the Main Menu and select Settings and then the Input Tab and then to Flight,

I bind the axis of the PS3 gamepad to the Rotation section of the Input screen.  It detects appropriately when I select an axis and push the stick along the axis.

 

But when I play KSP, it does not work.  I move the joysticks around, and no movement is noted. Now if I were to bind the triangle key to the keyboard key for pitching up, it would do that in game.  

 

But the joysticks do not work.

 

Thank you

Edited January 23, 2016 by rabidchild

I use a PS3 controller for planes and it works fine. Do you have the Motionjoy driver software installed? Also ive found that if I plug my controller in after KSP has booted up it will not work. I have to plug in the controller before I run the game. Works everytime.

Hope you get it working.
